document.full_text: it's a long shot, but the cure for the 26th-ranked tennis player juan martin del potro might come with a french open victory over the rampaging novak djokovic.
document.title: tennis: del potro needs balm for a spate of injuries
lines_and_colors: it's a long shot, but the cure for the 26th-ranked tennis player juan martin del potro might come with a french open victory over the rampaging novak djokovic.
